name: Tonka - On the Job
description: Prepare for an epic construction adventure with "Tonka - On the Job"! Step into the driver's seat of massive, heavy-duty machinery and tackle daunting building projects. From towering skyscrapers to massive bridges, your skills will be put to the test as you navigate intricate construction sites. Brace yourself for unexpected challenges and obstacles that will demand split-second reflexes and strategic thinking. Can you prove your mastery behind the controls and complete these monumental tasks? Get ready to roll up your sleeves and find out in this exhilarating construction sim!
